pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - LuxorStar Privacy Practices LuxorStar HOME ABOUT US Casino Contact Privacy and Policy LuxorStar prioritizes keeping your affairs private. This document explains how we gather, utilize, disclose, and secure your information when you explore our digital domain, encompassing any additional platforms, channels, mobile applications, or websites connected to it (collectively, the "Site"). Take a moment to thoroughly examine this confidentiality policy. If you disagree with the terms outlined here, please refrain from using the Site. Data We Harvest We may collect your data through various methods. The information we might harvest on the Site includes: Personal Information: Names, shipping addresses, email addresses, phone numbers, and demographic details like age, gender, hometown, and interests that you willingly provide when registering with the Site or participating in various activities, such as online chats and forums. Indirect Information: Information our servers automatically collect when you access the Site, like your IP address, browser type, operating system, access times, and the pages you viewed before and after the Site. Utilizing Your Information Having precise information about you allows us to provide a seamless, efficient, and personalized experience. More specifically, we may use information gathered about you via the Site to: Establish and manage your account. Process your transactions and send you related information, including purchase confirmations and receipts. Handle your requests and inquiries. Enhance the functionality of our platform. Disclosure of Your Information We may share information we have collected about you in certain circumstances. Your information may be disclosed as follows: Legally Required or to Safeguard Rights: If we believe disclosing your information is necessary to respond to legal proceedings, investigate or remedy potential violations of our policies, or protect the rights, property, and safety of others, we may share your information as permitted or required by any applicable law, rule, or regulation. The LuxorStar website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Accept Decline LuxorStar LUXURY CASINO HOTEL Experience luxury and entertainment at LuxorStar. pages.terms-conditions: Terms and Conditions - LuxorStar Policies LuxorStar HOME ABOUT US Casino Contact Welcome Terms and Conditions! Greetings and salutations! This document details the guidelines and regulations for navigating LuxorStar's digital domain. By venturing into this virtual space, we presume your acceptance of these regulations. If you disagree with any of the following, it's best to steer clear of LuxorStar. The following terminology applies throughout this document, including the Privacy Policy and Disclaimer, as well as any future agreements: "You" refers to the individual accessing this website and agreeing to our terms. "LuxorStar" or "We" refers to our organization. "Parties" refers to both you and LuxorStar. All terms encompass the offer, acceptance, and necessary payment to facilitate our assistance in fulfilling your needs, as outlined in the services we provide, adhering to the prevailing laws of India. Any usage of the aforementioned terms, singular or plural, capitalized or not, is interchangeable. Treats We utilize "treats," also known as cookies. By accessing LuxorStar, you consent to their usage as outlined in our Privacy Policy. Many interactive websites leverage cookies to remember user details across visits. Our website utilizes cookies to enhance specific functionalities, making your experience smoother. Some of our partners may also employ cookies for advertising purposes. Permission Unless explicitly stated otherwise, LuxorStar and/or its licensors hold exclusive ownership of all intellectual property on this platform. All intellectual property rights are reserved. You are granted access for personal use only, subject to the limitations outlined in these terms. Refrain from the following: Replicating LuxorStar's content elsewhere. Profiteering from LuxorStar's content through sale, rental, or sub-licensing. Recreating, duplicating, or copying LuxorStar's content. Sharing LuxorStar's content further.
